Tyler Ranch Home

Tyler, TX
3 Bed 2 Bath 1,400 sqft
Section 8 Ready Market Rate: $1,100/mo
Apply Now Schedule Tour

Property Overview

Newly renovated 3BR home with quartz counters and new HVAC. Section 8 accepted. This charming ranch-style home offers modern comforts with historic charm.

Section 8 Ready Veteran Priority Newly Renovated Modern Kitchen Central HVAC
Property Type Single Family Home
Year Built 1990 (Renovated 2025)
Lot Size 7,200 sqft
Available Immediately
